nonTimedSteps.title: Prep & Preheat
nonTimedSteps.directions: Fill your kettle with filtered water and bring it up to right before a boil. While you wait, grab your chemex, coffee, scale, and filter

nonTimedSteps.title: Measure & Grind
nonTimedSteps.directions: Use a scale to weight out about 42 grams of coffee and grind to a similar size of kosher salt. (#21 on a Baratza Encore)

timedSteps.title: Saturate the grounds
timedSteps.directions: Pouring in concentric circles, saturate grounds with 80g of water

timedSteps.title: Slow & Steady
timedSteps.directions: Continue, slowly pouring in concentric circles

timedSteps.title: Stop at 700g
timedSteps.directions: Stop pouring once you get to 700g of water

nonTimedSteps.title: Prep & Preheat
nonTimedSteps.directions: Fill your kettle with filtered water and bring it up to right before a boil. While you wait, grab your Aeropress, coffee, scale, filter, and a spoon or Aeropress paddle

nonTimedSteps.title: Measure & Grind
nonTimedSteps.directions: Use a scale to weight out about 17 grams of coffee and grind to a similar size of table salt. (#18 on a Baratza Encore)

nonTimedSteps.title: Prep the Aeropress
nonTimedSteps.directions: Place the filter in the basket and use the hot water from your kettle to rinse the filter.

nonTimedSteps.title: Add Coffee
nonTimedSteps.directions: Discard the rinse water from your mug. Affix the basket to the bottom of the brew chamber and place it on top of the mug. Add the coffee.

timedSteps.title: Add Water
timedSteps.directions: Saturate all the grounds within 10 seconds. Pour 220g of water. Spin the chamber, making sure all the coffee is saturated.

timedSteps.title: Place the Plunger
timedSteps.directions: Place the plunger on the brew chamber and pull up slightly to create a pressure seal. Donâ€™t plunge yet!

timedSteps.title: Stir and Plunge
timedSteps.directions: Give the slurry another stir with a spoon or paddle. Put the plunger back on and gently press down with steady pressure, stopping as soon as you hear a hissing sound.
